alert.note: Alert for Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 08 at 9:40PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Florida... Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens affecting Pasco County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall has caused water levels on Horse Creek near Arcadia and Cypress Creek at SR 54 Worthington Gardens to rise. For the Cypress Creek...including SR 54 Worthington Gardens...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding begins at the recreation area on State Road 54. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Thursday was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.3 feet on 01/24/1998. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Cypress Creek SR 54 Worthington 8.0 8.3 Thu 9 pm 8.2 8.1 8.1 8.1 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 1245 PM EDT.
